name: F-Balm™ Electrolyte Waterfacial Mask
ingredients:
-4-Electrolyte Blend: Antioxidant-rich and powerful humectant ingredients (coconut water, sodium PCA, magnesium PCA, and prickly pear extract), electrolytes are vital to helping maintain hydration levels in skin, improving barrier strength and lipid content, calming redness, and protecting against environmental dehydration.
-Vitamin F: Soothing fatty acids (linolenic and linoleic) play a vital role in maintaining hydration levels, improving skin texture and suppleness, reducing redness, and improving acid-mantle strength.
-Niacinamide: AKA vitamin B3, niacinamide has a wide range of benefits, most notably its ability to improve signs of aging (fine lines, wrinkles, loss of firmness) as well as uneven tone and texture; research has demonstrated that niacinamide, even in low concentrations, can help strengthen a compromised skin barrier, boost skin’s synthesis of ceramides and cholesterol—both essential substances in barrier health and elasticity—and improve skin’s defenses against water loss.

name: Skin Dope Argan Oil + 100 mg CBD
ingredients:
Argania Spinosa (Argan) Kernel Oil*, CBD Rich Hemp Extract**. *Organic. **Naturally-Derived. CBD at Sephora Standards Suppliers of CBD and other cannabinoid products sold at Sephora must meet the following standards:
1. Domestically grown hemp from the cannabis sativa plant with less than 0.3% THC which is non-psychoactive.
2. Full-spectrum CBD* or broad-spectrum CBD*. No CBD isolate*.
3. Triple-tested product for potency and contaminants*
4. Publicly available Certificate of Analysis (COA) of the final formula from the manufacturer.
5. Compliant with Clean at Sephora standards.

Fine print:
-Full-spectrum CBD: Contains CBD plus other compounds from the hemp plant. Less than 0.3% THC in the finished product which is non-psychoactive. These compounds are thought to work together to provide a synergistic effect. This may include terpenes, other cannabinoids (such as CBG, CBN, or CBC), flavonoids, and fatty acids.
-Broad-spectrum CBD: Contains CBD plus other compounds from the hemp plant. THC is removed. These compounds are thought to work together to provide a synergistic effect. This may include terpenes, other cannabinoids (such as CBG, CBN, or CBC), flavonoids, and fatty acids.
-CBD Isolate: A refined powder that has been stripped down to contain virtually pure CBD. No other compounds of the hemp plant are included.
-Testing: Every batch is tested three times. Testing is done on the raw hemp, the cannabinoid extract, and the final formula when manufactured. Testing confirms the product has no less CBD (in mg) than claimed on the label. Tested for contaminants including heavy metals, solvents, mycotoxins, pesticides, and microbials.

name: No:Rinse Micellar Cleansing Treatment
ingredients:
More than just a skincare line, Perricone MD is truly a brand that becomes a part of your life. Whether you're battling the inevitable signs of aging or preserving the skin you were born with, Perricone MD offers an intelligent and synergistic approach to achieving beautiful skin through simply and effectively maintaining its optimal health. Through years of research, Dr. Nicholas Perricone discovered an amazing revelation: we can control the way we age (wrinkles and all) by simply following an anti-inflammatory diet backed with nutritional supplements and antiaging topical skincare. Think of it as a prescription for beauty that comes from the inside out—as well as the outside in.

More than just a skincare line, Perricone MD is truly a brand that becomes a part of your life. ingredients:

name: Hypoallergenic Firming Eye Cream
ingredients:
More than just a skincare line, Perricone MD is truly a brand that becomes a part of your life. Whether you're battling the inevitable signs of aging or preserving the skin you were born with, Perricone MD offers an intelligent and synergistic approach to achieving beautiful skin through simply and effectively maintaining its optimal health. Through years of research, Dr. Nicholas Perricone discovered an amazing revelation: we can control the way we age (wrinkles and all) by simply following an anti-inflammatory diet backed with nutritional supplements and antiaging topical skincare. Think of it as a prescription for beauty that comes from the inside out—as well as the outside in.

Visit the Perricone MD boutique

More than just a skincare line, Perricone MD is truly a brand that becomes a part of your life. name: Liplift Lip Primer
ingredients:
If there were a dictionary devoted solely to beauty, you’d find Guerlain under the word classic. A purveyor of luxury fragrance, makeup, and skin care, Guerlain beauty standards have been consistently defined and redefined for more than 175 years. Since 1828, the company pioneered industry staples, including lipstick, eyeliner, mascara, and scientifically based skin care. And that's just the beginning: Their fragrance house has created over 700 perfumes, several of which are considered masterpieces.
